courses of regional college of education of ncert

text: 12. German Language Tr. Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18-65 years as on 31-03-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Integrated Post Graduate M.Sc. Courses of Regional College of Education of NCERT in the concerned subject or Master Degree from a recognized University with at least 50% marks in aggregate in relevant discipline for post 1, B.E. or B.Tech. (Computer Science /IT) or equivalent Degree or Diploma or B.E or B.Tech. (any stream ) and Post Graduate Diploma or M.Sc. (Computer Science )/ MCA or B.Sc. (Computer Science )/ BCA or Post Graduate Diploma in Computer and Post Graduate degree/ ‘B’ Level from DOEACC and Post Graduate degree in any subject for Post 2. For more details refer the notification. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may appear for interview along with along with application, original and a set of self attested copies of certificates, testimonials and passport size photograph on 18-02-2017 at 09:30 hours. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 18-02-2017 at 09:30 hours. Reporting Time: 09:00 am. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form Kendriya Vidyalaya No.1 Ishapore Jobs 2017 – Walk in for Teaching & Non Teaching Posts: Kendriya Vidyalaya No.1 Ishapore has published a notification for the recruitment of PGT, TGT, Primary Teacher, Computer Instructor, Vocational Instructor, Doctor & Nurse & Yoga Teacher vacancies on contractual basis to be engaged against the vacancy as and when occur during the session 2017-18. Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview on 20-02-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Kendriya Vidyalaya No.1 Ishapore Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: 1. PGT (English, Hindi, Maths, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, History, Geography, Economics) 2. PGT (Computer Science) 3. TGT (Hindi, English, Maths, Science, Social Studies, Sanskrit) 4. Primary Teacher 5. Computer Instructor (Teaching in classess III to V) 6. Vocational Instructor (Dance, Music, Games & Sports) 7. Doctor & Nurse 8. Yoga Teacher 9. Computer Instructor (Teaching classess VI onwards) Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master’s Degree from a recognized university with at least 50% marks in the concerned subject & B.Ed for S.No-01, BE or B.Tech (Computer Science/ IT) or an equivalent Degree or Diploma for S.No-02, four years integrated Degree course of Regional Institute of Education of NCERT in the concerned subjects with at least 50% marks in aggregate for S.No-03, 10+2 with at least 50% marks and CT/ JBT for S.No-04, B.Sc (Computer Science)/ BCA or equivalent and Post Graduation Degree in any subject for S.No-05. For more details refer the notification. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview along with application in prescribed format, one set of self attested copies of the mark sheets/ certificates/ testimonials (from High School onwards) etc., on 20-02-2017. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Registration Time: Between 08:00 AM to 09:00 AM only. Venue: Vidyalaya Premises. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form Kendriya Vidyalaya IIT Kharagpur Jobs 2017 – Teaching & Non Teaching Posts: Kendriya Vidyalaya, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Kharagpur has published notification for the recruitment of PGT, TGT, PRT, Computer Instructor, Skilled Teacher, Counselor, Doctor, Nurse & German Language Teacher vacancies on day to day basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 08-02-2017 by 02:00 pm. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. Kendriya Vidyalaya IIT Kharagpur Vacancy Details Name of the Post:
